name: Duoc Nguyen
tagline: Pi-shaped engineer: Backend/AI tooling × AI agents/MCP × Product iteration
bio: Engineering Manager at FireGroup, building e-commerce infrastructure.
13+ years shipping backend systems, developer tools, and AI integrations.
Created aiocean.io for rapid product experiments — Clik desktop app, MCP servers (Jira, Google, X).
Maintain obsidian-open-gate (222⭐), empowering 10K+ users with Obsidian web integration.
Write about engineering, product thinking, and AI at 12bit.vn and onepercent.plus.
Co-founded Vue.js Vietnam community in 2016 — built bridges for Vietnamese developers.
Believe in shipping fast, iterating often, and building tools that multiply developer leverage.
now: Shipping MCP servers and AI tooling (x-mcp, google-mcp)
Iterating on Clik desktop app releases at aiocean
Building vite-plugin-ai-annotator for AI-powered code mods
